name: The Grisaia Trilogy
overview: For the first time since its humble beginnings as a PC game, and after the handheld, manga, and anime adaptations that followed, the complete "The Fruit of Grisaia" Trilogy is now available on the Nintendo Switch™ system in one complete collection. Set in an academy isolated from the outside world, the heart-rending tales of five heroines begins. The whole "The Fruit of Grisaia" series in one bundle
